headline: Coinbase Buyback Expansion And Clarity Act Debate Reshape Investor Trade Offs
summary: Coinbase Global (NasdaqGS:COIN) has expanded its stock buyback program by an additional US$2b, taking total repurchases to more than 8 million shares. The company is ramping up buybacks during a volatile period for crypto markets, signaling management confidence in Coinbase's capital position and business model. At the same time, Coinbase is pushing publicly for progress on the U.S. Clarity Act as a key deadline approaches, with CEO Brian Armstrong expressing optimism on regulatory...

headline: Morning Movers: Tri Pointe surges after deal to be acquired
summary: Stock futures were trending lower, extending the pain from a sharp selloff in the previous session, but have improved following the January CPI release. The headline inflation rate fell in January, while the core rate eased as expected, maintaining market bets that the Federal Reserve will cut rates multiple times this year.Valentine's Day Sale - 70% OffUnlock hedge fund-level data and powerful investing tools for smarter, sharper decisions Stay ahead of the market with the latest news and analy

headline: The Great Rotation From Tech To REITs Is Finally Here
summary: AI is eroding business moats and accelerating competition across sectors. Read why real assets like REITs benefit as capital rotates to anti-AI investments.

headline: Review & Preview: Inflation Yawner?
summary: A cooler-than-expected inflation report left stocks flat on the day, but pushed Treasury yields lower as investors priced in the possibility of more rate cuts in the months to come.  The 2-year and 10-year Treasury bonds were each down roughly five basis points on the day, or 0.05 percentage points.  Over the last two days the two- and 10-year yields have dropped 10 and 12 basis points, respectively.
